entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
